'''METW: Aragorn II''' is a game card from the set ''[[Middle-earth: The Wizards]]'', for [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game|MECCG]].

'''''Note:''''' ''"Aragorn II" refers to the character [[Aragorn|Aragorn II]] from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]].''

==Card text==

'''''Unique.''''' +2 direct influence against the [[METW: Rangers of the North|Rangers of the North]] faction. 

-3 marshalling points if eliminated. 

''"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost..."'' '''''-[[The Lord of the Rings|LotRI]]'''''
